notes.body: We're seeing signs of recovery, but are still investigating the root cause of the issue. We'll be back with an update as soon as we have more info to share.
Our investigation is still ongoing at this time. We'll report back once we have news to share. Thank you for your patience.
Users are experiencing general delays with the service, including issues with connecting to Slack and loading channels. We're looking into this and will share an update once we have more information.
